question: There are challenges with managing Type 1 diabetes! If one's mind is not capable to deal with this ailment, one can die early! Unexpectation are the worst and not all type 1ers are the same where, comparing notes can be fatal! It has to be a one on one maintenance as to what will work for each.My younger sister & I have this challenge and face it together. Including who we each are as individuals facing the same ailment.The challenges don't care if we're disciplined or not! Even tho' it still counts...
title: 36yrs of Type 1
